Package com.example.carturestibackend.services

Class OrderService

java.lang.Object
com.example.carturestibackend.services.OrderService
@Service public class OrderService extends Object
Service class to handle business logic related to orders.

      Deletes an order from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id_order - The ID of the order to delete.

    • updateOrder

      public OrderDTO updateOrder(String id, OrderDTO orderDTO)
      Updates an existing order in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the order to update.
      orderDTO - The updated OrderDTO object representing the new state of the order.
      Returns:
      The updated OrderDTO object.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException - if the order with the specified ID is not found.
